tool_description: Maps seasonal availability windows for wild edible species based on location, climate data, and phenological patterns.

species_name.description: Scientific or common name of the plant species

elevation_meters.description: Elevation above sea level in meters

plant_part.description: Plant part to harvest: leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, seeds, bark

climate_zone.description: Climate classification: temperate, subtropical, boreal, alpine, arid, mediterranean

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180
Invalid year range: Target year must be between 1900 and 2030
Invalid plant part: Use one of [leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, seeds, bark]
Species not found: The specified species is not in the database
Invalid climate zone: Use one of [temperate, subtropical, boreal, alpine, arid, mediterranean]
Elevation out of range: Elevation must be between -500 and 9000 meters
usage: Specify the plant species, location coordinates, target year, and desired plant part. The tool returns seasonal availability windows with peak harvest periods.

availability_start.description: Start date of availability window in YYYY-MM-DD format

availability_end.description: End date of availability window in YYYY-MM-DD format

peak_harvest_start.description: Start of optimal harvest period in YYYY-MM-DD format

peak_harvest_end.description: End of optimal harvest period in YYYY-MM-DD format

quality_rating.description: Expected quality during peak: excellent, good, fair, poor

abundance_level.description: Expected abundance: high, moderate, low, rare
